content.p: Sutton Bonington Campus encompasses world-leading laboratories and specialist facilities for studying biosciences and veterinary medicine. The campus is home to over 2,500 students from the Schools of Biosciences and Veterinary Medicine, which creates a place where itâ€™s easy to get to know your fellow students and teaching teams, yet part of a wider global community. Sutton Bonington's dedicated Student Hub is located in The Burrow, in The Barn and is your 'one stop shop' for student queries. For information and support about facilities, services or anything else you can contact or visit the Student Hub team. For campus information please visit the Student Hub SharePoint site. You can find up to date and regular information about the Sutton Bonington campus on our Instagram page: @uonsuttonbonington Sutton Bonington Instagram page Telephone: +44 (0)115 951 5151
